title: Vibrant Central Wan Chai Stay with Communal Music, Arcade & Art Spaces
description: Connect with new friends and spend time in the centre of lively Wan Chai at Ying'nflo Wan Chai Hong Kong. Spend time meeting new people in the multipurpose social spaces, from the outdoor terrace to the arcade room, grab a refreshment from the vending machine or hang out in the music room. When its time to explore, you are walking distance from local galleries, eclectic eateries and vibrant nightlife.
offer_address: 3-5 Wan Chai Gap Road, Wan Chai, Hong Kong

title: Contemporary Hong Kong Stay Close to Admirality & Wan Chai Neighbourhoods
description: Experience a vibrant and contemporary Hong Kong stay at Ying'nflo, Wesley Admiralty, Hong Kong. Located between Admirality and Wan Chai, you'll be well-placed to explore the high-end shopping, eclectic arts and music scene, and incredible dining the city is famous for. With the MTR subway station less than a 10-minute walk away, the best of Hong Kong, including Disneyland and Ocean Park, is at your fingertips.
offer_address: 22 Hennessy Road, Wan Chai,, Hong Kong

title: Ultra-Modern Hong Kong Retreat with Rooftop Whiskey Bar & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Fall in love with Hong Kong at this sophisticated stay - a modern sanctuary in the vibrant district of Wan Chai. With soaring ceilings and warm wood accents, each room is a peaceful retreat that perfectly complements the neighbourhood's mix of sleek urban living and pulsing energy.

Discover an exquisite French-Hong Kong fusion at TANGRAM Bistro or sip rare, herb-infused cocktails high above the skyline at the popular Uncle Ming’s rooftop whisky bar. Unwind at the elegant lobby lounge, keep up with our routine in the 24-hour fitness centre and take in the city lights from your room as the day winds down.
offer_address: 239 Jaffe Road, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
